item.title: 美国参议员寻求阻止墨西哥接管沃尔坎港
item.description: 一个由两党议员组成的美国参议员团体正在提议立法，向墨西哥总统安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔施压，要求其放弃征用阿拉巴马州沃尔坎材料公司的一个港口和石灰石采石场的计划。【原文：A bipartisan group of US senators is proposing legislation to pressure Mexican President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador to back down from plans to expropriate a port and limestone quarry from Alabama’s Vulcan Materials Co.】

item.title: 体育直播的非法流媒体已成为主流。还能做些什么吗？
item.description: 广播公司正面临着全球范围内非法体育直播流媒体的激增，这使他们失去了数百亿美元的潜在收入，而他们似乎对此无能为力。【原文：Broadcasters are facing a worldwide surge in illegal streaming of live sports that’s depriving them of tens of billions of dollars in potential revenue, and there seems to be little they can do about it.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔在 60 年来最严重的干旱中提前开始停电

item.title: 基夫称汇丰希望加入人工智能基础设施融资热潮
item.description: 汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一位资深投资银行家表示，该公司希望加入为人工智能所需的基础设施融资的大潮。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc wants to join in the rush to finance the infrastructure needed to roll out artificial intelligence, according to one of the lender’s most senior investment bankers.】

item.title: 日本央行观察家关注自民党选举，只为一位候选人
item.description: 日本央行的观察家们正密切关注日本执政党自民党的领导层选举，以了解其对货币政策前景的潜在影响，关注的焦点是一个强烈主张维持宽松立场的党派。【原文：Bank of Japan watchers are keeping a close eye on the leadership election of the nation’s ruling Liberal Democratic Party for potential implications on the monetary policy outlook, with attention focused on a strong advocate of maintaining an easing stance.】

item.title: Wayfair 将从高收益债券市场借款 7 亿美元
item.description: 在线家具零售商 Wayfair LLC 正寻求从垃圾债券市场借款 7 亿美元，为现有到期债券再融资。【原文：Online furniture retailer Wayfair LLC is looking to borrow $700 million from the junk-bond market to refinance existing maturities.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利警告匈牙利经济风险将导致福林下滑
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）警告福林将大幅下挫，并加入了认为匈牙利面临财政和货币政策风险交织的策略师行列。【原文：Morgan Stanley warned of a steep selloff in the forint, joining the ranks of strategists who see Hungary facing a confluence of fiscal and monetary-policy risks.】

item.title: 拜登政府提议禁止使用中国和俄罗斯汽车零部件
item.description: 拜登政府正在提议制定一项规则，阻止销售和进口中国和俄罗斯制造的用于联网汽车的硬件和软件，从而有可能加强美国的安全，抵御商务部称之为 "非常真实 "的黑客攻击威胁。【原文：The Biden administration is proposing a rule to block the sale and import of Chinese- and Russian-made hardware and software for connected vehicles, potentially bolstering US security against a hacking threat that the Commerce Department describes as “very real.”】

item.title: 欧盟将为较贫穷国家发行绿色债券提供补贴

item.title: 墨西哥司法爆炸案后，阿姆罗的继任者必须收拾残局
item.description: 安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔（Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador）总统留给墨西哥继任者的是动荡的货币、不温不火的经济增长和自上世纪80年代以来最严重的预算赤字。但克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆将面临的最紧迫挑战是平息投资者对即将离任的领导人全面改革司法机构的担忧。【原文：President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador is leaving his successor in Mexico a volatile currency, tepid economic growth and the widest budget deficit since the 1980s. But the most urgent challenge Claudia Sheinbaum will face is calming investor fears over the outgoing leader’s overhaul of the judiciary.】

item.title: GIC 和魁北克养老金支持布鲁克菲尔德的新兴市场转型基金
